title: Looking for D+ Mid laner to join our team.
body:
We are looking for a committed and reliable person with good communication.

Toxic players must not apply, must have ts/skype/discord. Must be 18+.

Minimum diamond 5. Must have some experience in ranked 5's. Main mid laner with 5+ champion pool pref.

Please add comment bellow with your:

-Brief description as a player (style)
-Champion pool
-Availability.

Feel free to add in game Meion.
